item.title: SSVD: Structured SVD for Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning and Benchmarking under Domain Shift in ASR
item.description: arXiv:2509.02830v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT) has emerged as a scalable solution for adapting large foundation models. While low-rank adaptation (LoRA) is widely used in speech applications, its state-of-the-art variants, e.g., VeRA, DoRA, PiSSA, and SVFT, a...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, model, release, vision, fine-tuning | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: A-SEA3L-QA: A Fully Automated Self-Evolving, Adversarial Workflow for Arabic Long-Context Question-Answer Generation
item.description: arXiv:2509.02864v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present an end-to-end, self-evolving adversarial workflow for long-context Question-Answer (QA) Generation in Arabic. By orchestrating multiple specialized LVLMs: a question generator, an evaluator, and a swarm of answer generators, our system iter...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, model, release, vision, context | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 80%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
